sourcesContent:
// src/components/MyWallet.js - Complete with Download Option import React, { useState } from 'react'; const MyWallet = ({ onBack }) => { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('main'); // 'main' or 'documents' // Fixed documents array to be read-only const documents = [ { id: 1, type: 'passport', title: 'Passport', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ›‚', status: 'verified', color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600', details: { number: 'A12345678', expiry: '2030-12-31', country: 'India', issueDate: '2020-12-31', issuedBy: 'Government of India' } }, { id: 2, type: 'aadhar', title: 'Aadhar Card', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ†”', status: 'verified', color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600', details: { number: 'XXXX-XXXX-1234', name: 'John Doe', address: 'New Delhi, India', dateOfBirth: '1990-01-01' } }, { id: 3, type: 'visa', title: 'Visa', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ“‹', status: 'pending', color: 'from-orange-500 to-orange-600', details: { type: 'Tourist Visa', country: 'USA', validity: '2025-06-30', entries: 'Multiple', purpose: 'Tourism' } }, { id: 4, type: 'insurance', title: 'Travel Insurance', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ›¡ï¸', status: 'verified', color: 'from-teal-500 to-teal-600', details: { policy: 'TI-123456', coverage: '$100,000', expiry: '2025-12-31', provider: 'HDFC ERGO', type: 'Comprehensive' } }, { id: 5, type: 'flight', title: 'Flight Insurance', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'âœˆï¸', status: 'verified', color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600', details: { flight: 'AI-101', date: '2025-01-15', coverage: '$50,000', airline: 'Air India', route: 'DEL-BOM' } }, { id: 6, type: 'tickets', title: 'Flight Tickets', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸŽ«', status: 'verified', color: 'from-indigo-500 to-indigo-600', details: { from: 'Delhi (DEL)', to: 'Mumbai (BOM)', date: '2025-01-15', time: '14:30', seat: '12A' } }, { id: 7, type: 'hotel', title: 'Hotel Bookings', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ¨', status: 'verified', color: 'from-pink-500 to-pink-600', details: { hotel: 'Taj Hotel', checkin: '2025-01-15', checkout: '2025-01-20', rooms: '1 Deluxe Room', location: 'Mumbai' } }, { id: 8, type: 'other', title: 'Other Documents', subtitle: '5 entities', icon: 'ðŸ“„', status: 'pending', color: 'from-gray-500 to-gray-600', details: { count: '12 documents', type: 'Various', lastUpdated: '2025-01-01', status: 'Pending Review' } } ]; const [selectedDocument, setSelectedDocument] = useState(null); const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false); const handleAddDocument = () => { setShowAddForm(true); }; const handleViewDocument = (doc) => { setSelectedDocument(doc); }; // Download document function const handleDownloadDocument = (document) => { const documentData = ` RAAHI TRAVEL APP - DOCUMENT EXPORT ===================================== Document: ${document.title} Type: ${document.type.toUpperCase()} Status: ${document.status.toUpperCase()} Export Date: ${new Date().toLocaleDateString()} DOCUMENT DETAILS: ================ ${Object.entries(document.details).map(([key, value]) => `${key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1).replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1')}: ${value}` ).join('\n')} Generated by RAAHI - Welcome to India Contact: support@raahi.com `.trim(); const element = document.createElement('a'); const file = new Blob([documentData], {type: 'text/plain'}); element.href = URL.createObjectURL(file); element.download = `RAAHI_${document.title.replace(/\s+/g, '_')}_${new Date().getTime()}.txt`; document.body.appendChild(element); element.click(); document.body.removeChild(element); // Show success message alert(`âœ… ${document.title} downloaded successfully!`); }; const renderMainView = () => (
{/* Important Documents Header */}

Important Documents

{/* Primary Documents */}
{documents.slice(0, 4).map((doc) => (
{doc.icon}

{doc.title}

{doc.subtitle}

))}
{/* Add New Document Button */}
{/* Quick Stats */}
{documents.filter(d => d.status === 'verified').length}

Verified

{documents.filter(d => d.status === 'pending').length}

Pending

); const renderDocumentsView = () => (
{/* All Documents Grid */}
{documents.map((doc) => (
{doc.icon}

{doc.title}

{doc.subtitle}

{doc.status === 'verified' ? 'Verified' : 'Pending'}
))}
{/* Add Document Button */}
); const renderDocumentViewer = () => (
{selectedDocument.icon}

{selectedDocument.title}

{selectedDocument.status === 'verified' ? 'Verified' : 'Pending Verification'}
{/* Document Details */}
{Object.entries(selectedDocument.details).map(([key, value]) => (
{key.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1').trim()}: {value}
))}
{/* Actions - Updated with Download */}
); const renderAddForm = () => (

Add New Document

Click to upload or drag and drop

PDF, JPG, PNG up to 10MB

); return (
{/* Header with Back Button */}

My Wallet

Secure document storage

{/* View Toggle - Only show when not viewing document or add form */} {!selectedDocument && !showAddForm && (
)}
{/* Content */}
{showAddForm ? renderAddForm() : selectedDocument ? renderDocumentViewer() : currentView === 'main' ? renderMainView() : renderDocumentsView()}
{/* Fixed Bottom Navigation */}
); }; export default MyWallet;
